price: (26) Indeed in that is a lesson [i.e., warning] for whoever would fear [Allāh].
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
